title: ResearchStudy Classifier Code System

extension.valueMarkdown: ResearchStudy Classifier Code System [Database Entry: FHIR CodeSystem Resource]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper, MD, MSPH [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 419455. Revised 2025-12-15. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/419455. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/CodeSystem/419455#json.

name: ResearchStudyClassifierCodeSystem
description: This CodeSystem is used for common values for the ResearchStudy.classifier element and will likely move to terminology.hl7.org when it is mature.

concept.definition: A medication regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
A medical device regulated by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
Human subjects research that is excempt from oversight and monitoring by an institutional review board (IRB).
Research regulated by a specific German legal requirement (Medizinproduktegesetz MPG Paragraph 23b).
